thread.section_title: La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Girl trip
thread.title_full: Girl trip - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Cheri H
title: Girl trip
text: Stayed here 2 times. Walking distance to Penn station. Nice, clean hotel decent price for Manhattan prices. Good central location too. Breakfast is always crowded, so haven't tried that. But for a good, decent hotel in Manhattan with out blowing your budget this is it. One block from the empire state building. One block from Broadway st.
